# SlowRead

> Daily passages from classic literature — a reading companion for the unhurried.

SlowRead is a mobile reading app that delivers one curated passage per day from public domain literary classics. It combines AI-powered reading companions with bilingual reading, smart scheduling, and reading streaks to help readers build a consistent habit of deep reading.

## Core Features

- Daily curated passages from classic literature
- AI reading companion (character maps, plot recaps, cultural context, vocabulary)
- Bilingual side-by-side reading (all major languages)
- Smart passage splitting at natural story pause points
- Personalized reading schedule with adaptive pacing
- Reading streaks and milestones
- Text-to-Speech for classics read aloud
- Offline reading support
- Beautiful typography with ink-on-paper aesthetic

## Pricing

- Free: One passage per day, full public domain library, reading streaks, personalized schedule, basic bilingual mode, daily reminders
- Pro: $4.99/month — unlimited reading, AI reading companion, deep vocabulary, text-to-speech, offline reading, annual reading report
